Description:
PRIMARY PURPOSE:To call on both existing and prospective buyers within a prescribed geographical area, and maximize sales of the Company's products within trading guidelines established by Sales Management.
To forecast business potential within his territory for short term and to report on market conditions and competitive activity within his territory.PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES:Provide a forecast for his assigned key customer list / territory.
Achieve target sales volume and turnover.
Achieve cost-effective sales coverage of his territory.
Quotation/Tender presentation and follow-up.
Make professional client presentations that promote price-value advantage.
Submit accurate sales forecasts for his territory.
Responsible for CRM reporting – opportunities, rental, used and projects’ updates.
Report on all relevant competitive/market activities.
Maintain a high level of product knowledge.
Any other project/task assigned by the Franchise Sales ManagerSkills
Skills: Customer requirements, territories, projects, competitors’ strengths and weaknesses.

Excellent Heavy Machinery product knowledge. Ability to understand the features and operation of technical products and effectively communicate.
Software skills: PowerPoint, Excel for preparing and making professional presentations to customers.

Fluency in both English and Arabic.
Good communication skills, both written and verbal.
Minimum 5 year's experience in Sales with Heavy Machinery Dealer.
